channel.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
channel.description:
[b] re release cba with it this client has all the files now :D good luck not gunna help with errors cba well i might depends if have time and stuff[/b]
source - [url=http://up.ht/rTzhJM]http://up.ht/rTzhJM[/url] client - [url=http://up.ht/vPzdd0]http://up.ht/vPzdd0[/url]
[img]http://s11.postimage.org/p9jbui4tf/Untitled_1.png[/img]
[b]Hey guys another project i am doing with a friend hope you like[/b] add me originalpkz@hotmail.co.uk
Green: Works 95%-100% Yellow: Started Red:Doesn't Work and Havent Started
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size][/b] Attack Strength Defence Ranged Prayer Magic Constitution Mining Smithing Crafting Fishing Cookin Woodcutting Firemaking Slayer Agility RuneCrafting Farming herblore summoning Dungeoneering Hunter Construction
Christmas event added thanks to my mate :D [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture242.png[/img] When you complete the quest you get a reward and this pops up [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture243.png[/img]
added drop party room didnt use a tutorial [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture239.png[/img]
thats what they horse says when you click on them [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture238.png[/img]
update prat 1 off the quest done this is just some off the pictures off the dialog off the quest
[img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture234.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture235.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture236.png[/img][ [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture226.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture228.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture229-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture230-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture227.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture231.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture233.png[/img] [b]just for xmas[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture240.png[/img] [center] i'm not good with guessing how much i should get but if im wrong im sorry[/center] [center] Credits [/center] [center] who ever made the base 35% Liamp(me) 45% robbie for some help %10 loveandpower %10 if i have missed someone out pm me ill add u in[/center]
stuff we i did / other people there was more but i forgot [code]Update 15th December added Christmas event Update 14th December added ::snowon and ::snowoff just for xmas update date 11th December added drop party room update date 10th December and did a little change in the prymide plunder added 100% horse game update date 9th December moved all npc around update date 8th December prt1 off the quest done little tweak in firemaking[/code]
[b]btw its nice if you post a comment & summoning needs a leveling up system and to be able to make a pouch unless you make a shop with all pouches init and make when you first log in you get 99summoning + the skillcape would be nice if u improved this [/b]

item.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
item.dc:creator: @immortalityftw immortalityftw
item.description:
@immortalityftw wrote:

Mezzy please stop acting like you know wth you’re talking about. Why would leechers switch to Hyperion or shard? There is hardly any tutorials for them. Secondly, many PI servers do handle 100+ players properly. PI’s framework is initially trash, but through server optimization(which works quite well) PI becomes increasingly stable.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:137, topic:425639”][quote author=ComputerLove link=topic=528293.msg3864441#msg3864441 date=1324890121]

^ um yeah…I was still adding it

Maybe the owners of this rsps shouldn’t release their work because it’s unfinished and tricking people to download unfinished work…

Lolz… I go on this forums because I like runescape and playing on a private server not for learning java (but i still know little coding). By the way, when i try to put things in the chest the items don’t show up and I can’t accept the accept button in the chest…
ok so you try and fix the drop party room with no help from server help section and fix the combat how is that unfinished ?

don’t you mean your lazy and cant even fix some stuff your self

[/quote]
You just proved his point, no one really wants to fix everything for you. Start doing things for yourself rather than waiting for someone to do it for you, you’ll feel much more satisfied in the end.[/quote]

^stfu because most servers when people download them need to be improved and if people can’t fix simple stuff then get a grip to make the drop party work kinda simple just didn’t release the source with drop party working because some people need to do stuff for them self insted off getting the person who released this to do it

Read full topic
